markdownRemark.excerpt: The second annual Sinterklaas Gift Exchange with some friends in Beijing. I couldn’t bring myself to write a bad poem, so instead I made a video doing what I…
markdownRemark.html: The second annual Sinterklaas Gift Exchange with some friends in Beijing. I couldn’t bring myself to write a bad poem, so instead I made a video doing what I love doing! I have used natural language processing in the past to analyze tweets, however, this was something different. Enjoy!
